ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 761
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... I just can t believe a prof got away with being able to play EQ DURING a class.  How much EQ do you guys actually get to experience?  I m
ygData.messageBody:
EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> There are 2 messages in this issue.
>
> Topics in this digest:
>
> 1. Help me pass my school project! Please!
> From: "smogtorthedude" <jledoux@...>
> 2. Re: Help me pass my school project! Please!
> From: "Chirrichela Lomarcan" <yssario@...>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Fri, 23 May 2003 23:09:04 -0000
> From: "smogtorthedude" <jledoux@...>
> Subject: Help me pass my school project! Please!
>
> Fellow EverQuest'ers. I am a communications student at the
> University of Washington in Seattle, WA. For a class I'm taking,
> I
> have to write a paper about Everquest. It would REALLY help me
<snip>
> Our survey is located at:
> http://www.sitedifference.com/edu/COM480 .
>
> If you would like more info on the class I'm taking, the course
> website is at http://faculty.washington.edu/redwood/com480/
>
> Thank you very much. My grade depends on you.
>
>

I just can't believe a prof got away with being able to play EQ DURING a
class. How much EQ do you guys actually get to experience? I'm curious
now. Ya'll can't be getting the full immersive experience with a prof
tagging along. Own up, does he make ya'll raid something for phat lewt
and keep the stuff for himself? If he doesn't have an established
character that is profiting from this I'll eat my hat.

Was just reading the weblog entries at livejournal. Someone was talking
about offering 5pp to someone for taking the survey. One of the people
who they got to take the survey was a level 40. Level 40 people KNOW
that you are a newbie if you think 5pp is alot of money. Also, most
long time players don't trust people doing interviews. We haven't
gotten very good press, there has been various times when some players
have helped someone with similar interviews and then it's come back and
bitten us in the behind. Look up stories from when that poor
unfortunate young man killed himself and his mom blamed it on EQ for
some examples, sorry I don't have any urls at the moment.

Since it seems ya'll have a class of raw newbies, some EQ urls for ya:
<everquest.allakhazam.com> more quest information than you can ever process
<eq.crgaming.com> class-specific information for every class, spell
info and what skills you should have for each level.
ya'll have eqatlas already on the links page.
<www.eqtraders.com> trade-skills information,EQ isn't just about kill
the monster for experience, also look up the quests page on that site,
then look for your class and race, every newbie has a newbie armor quest
to keep them busy.
and for Tunare's sake, get thyselves away from Misty Thicket unless you
really really need the newbie armor quest materials. See more of
Norrath, you won't regret it.
